name: Sniffing
body:
# General
* Scope
 * Only layer 2 & above (assuming physical network infrastructure)
* TCP/IP & OSI
* Layers
* Protocols
 * Protocol stacks
* Message formatting
 * Headers
 * Payloads
 * Footers
* Message addressing & transmission
 * Unicast
 * Broadcast
 * Multicast
* Performance terminology
 * Speed
 * Bandwidth
 * Throughput
 * Latency
* Standards & RFCs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
